## CookiePermanentStorageService.remove() method

Removes value stored with 'name' from permanent storage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
remove(name: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>any</code> | Name of stored value that will be removed |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
